title: Claimed by her Stepbrother
description: One night of passion with her billionaire stepbrother Christian has left Melanie Jacobs in an interesting condition. Christian’s supermodel fiancée has generously offered to raise the child as her own – provided Christian never see Melanie again. Can Melanie really give up her baby to her stepbrother and his future bride? Can Christian really give up his alluring stepsister? Find out in … Claimed by her Stepbrother.
author: Taryn James
